channel.title: Comments on: Corona Geek #52 – Making a Character Jump in Corona SDK

item.title: By: Ed Maurina
item.dc:creator: Ed Maurina
item.description:
@Michael,
Hi. I've started a new gitHub sub-repository here:
https://github.com/roaminggamer/RG_FreeStuff/tree/master/Corona%20Geek
It will contain code, assets, etc. that I talk about or in some way participate in the editing/review/etc. of while on the hangout.
The code for this show is here:
https://github.com/roaminggamer/RG_FreeStuff/tree/master/Corona%20Geek/Hangout%2052
Please note, SSK is separate and stored here: https://github.com/roaminggamer/SSKCorona The SSK Wiki (small though it may be) is here: https://github.com/roaminggamer/SSKCorona/wiki
item.content:encoded:
@Michael,

Hi. I’ve started a new gitHub sub-repository here:

https://github.com/roaminggamer/RG_FreeStuff/tree/master/Corona%20Geek

It will contain code, assets, etc. that I talk about or in some way participate in the editing/review/etc. of while on the hangout.

The code for this show is here:

https://github.com/roaminggamer/RG_FreeStuff/tree/master/Corona%20Geek/Hangout%2052

Please note, SSK is separate and stored here: https://github.com/roaminggamer/SSKCorona
The SSK Wiki (small though it may be) is here: https://github.com/roaminggamer/SSKCorona/wiki

item.title: By: Tony
item.dc:creator: Tony
item.description: Thanks for posting! The math2d functions are definitely a huge time-saver. Thanks for taking the time to go through it in detail.
item.content:encoded: Thanks for posting! The math2d functions are definitely a huge time-saver. Thanks for taking the time to go through it in detail.

item.title: By: Michael
item.dc:creator: Michael
item.description: can you store the samples as a zip file on GitHub, makes it easier to download. THX
item.content:encoded:
can you store the samples as a zip file on GitHub, makes it easier to download.
THX
